languages.text: {n}Гигант издает хриплый смешок.{/n} "Кунрад был жалок, слаб и тщеславен — не то что ты. Ты изрек{mf||ла} имя рассветов, ты пролил{mf||а} кровь ложноверцев, и ты вызволил{mf||а} Господина из древней темницы. Кунрад не смог свершить даже крупицы того, на что оказал{mf|ся|ась} способ{mf|ен|на} ты. С чего мне предавать кого-то столь могучего как ты, чемпион?"

{n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"
languages.original_text: {n}Гигант издает хриплый смешок.{/n} "Кунрад был жалок, слаб и тщеславен — не то что ты. Ты изрек{mf||ла} имя рассветов, ты пролил{mf||а} кровь ложноверцев, и ты вызволил{mf||а} Господина из древней темницы. Кунрад не смог свершить даже крупицы того, на что оказал{mf|ся|ась} способ{mf|ен|на} ты. С чего мне предавать кого-то столь могучего как ты, чемпион?"

You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilled the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you ended up being capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

languages.text: « Kunrad était faible, pathétique et vain. Il n'était rien, à côté de vous, {n}lâche-t-il avec un rire rauque.{/n} Vous avez prononcé le nom de l'aube, versé le sang des mécréants et délivré le maître de sa prison ancestrale. Kunrad aurait été bien incapable d'accomplir un centième de ce que vous avez fait. Pourquoi trahirais-je un individu de votre trempe, {mf|champion|championne} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

traits.locale_text: « Kunrad était faible, pathétique et vain. Il n'était rien, à côté de vous, {n}lâche-t-il avec un rire rauque.{/n} Vous avez prononcé le nom de l'aube, versé le sang des mécréants et délivré le maître de sa prison ancestrale. Kunrad aurait été bien incapable d'accomplir un centième de ce que vous avez fait. Pourquoi trahirais-je un individu de votre trempe, {mf|champion|championne} ? »

languages.text: {n}Deja escapar una carcajada ronca.{/n} «Kunrad era débil, patético y vanidoso, y no era nada en comparación contigo. Tú has pronunciado el nombre del amanecer, has derramado la sangre de los infieles, has liberado al amo de su prisión ancestral. Kunrad no podría haber conseguido ni una fracción de tus éxitos. ¿Por qué traicionaría a alguien tan fuerte como tú, campe{mf|ón|ona}?».
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Deja escapar una carcajada ronca.{/n} «Kunrad era débil, patético y vanidoso, y no era nada en comparación contigo. Tú has pronunciado el nombre del amanecer, has derramado la sangre de los infieles, has liberado al amo de su prisión ancestral. Kunrad no podría haber conseguido ni una fracción de tus éxitos. ¿Por qué traicionaría a alguien tan fuerte como tú, campe{mf|ón|ona}?».

languages.text: {n}彼は声を荒らげて笑う。{/n}「クンラッドは弱く、哀れで、うぬぼれが強かった。お前とは比べるべくもない。お前は夜明けの名を語り、不信心者の血を流し、古代の牢獄から主を解放した。クンラッドは、お前が証明した能力の一欠片も為し得なかったのだ。なぜ私がお前のような強き者を裏切らなければならないというのだ、英雄よ」
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は声を荒らげて笑う。{/n}「クンラッドは弱く、哀れで、うぬぼれが強かった。お前とは比べるべくもない。お前は夜明けの名を語り、不信心者の血を流し、古代の牢獄から主を解放した。クンラッドは、お前が証明した能力の一欠片も為し得なかったのだ。なぜ私がお前のような強き者を裏切らなければならないというのだ、英雄よ」

languages.text: {n}他发出了沙哑的大笑声。{/n}“昆拉德是个软弱而虚荣的可怜虫，与你相比简直不值一提。你道出了黎明的名字，你让伪神的信徒血流成河，你将主人从古老的牢狱中释放出来。你成就了如此伟业，可昆拉德就连你的九牛一毛都比不上。我为什么要背叛像你这么强大的人，勇士？”
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他发出了沙哑的大笑声。{/n}“昆拉德是个软弱而虚荣的可怜虫，与你相比简直不值一提。你道出了黎明的名字，你让伪神的信徒血流成河，你将主人从古老的牢狱中释放出来。你成就了如此伟业，可昆拉德就连你的九牛一毛都比不上。我为什么要背叛像你这么强大的人，勇士？”

languages.text: {n}Er stößt ein raues Lachen aus.{/n} "Kunrad war schwach, armselig und eingebildet. Und er war nichts gegen Euch. Ihr habt die Namen der Dämmerungen ausgesprochen, das Blut von Ungläubigen vergossen und den Meister aus seinem Gefängnis befreit. Kunrad vermochte nicht einmal einen Bruchteil dessen, wozu Ihr in der Lage wart. Weshalb sollte ich jemanden verraten, der so stark ist, wie Ihr es seid, Champion?"
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er stößt ein raues Lachen aus.{/n} "Kunrad war schwach, armselig und eingebildet. Und er war nichts gegen Euch. Ihr habt die Namen der Dämmerungen ausgesprochen, das Blut von Ungläubigen vergossen und den Meister aus seinem Gefängnis befreit. Kunrad vermochte nicht einmal einen Bruchteil dessen, wozu Ihr in der Lage wart. Weshalb sollte ich jemanden verraten, der so stark ist, wie Ihr es seid, Champion?"

languages.text: {n}Boğuk bir sesle gülüyor.{/n} "Kunrad zayıf, zavallı ve faydasızdı, sana kıyasla hiçbir şeydi. Sen şafakların ismini dillendirdin, inançsızların kanını döktün, bu kadim hapishanenin efendisini serbest bıraktın. Kunrad senin muktedir olduğunu ispatladığın şeylerin zerresini başaramamıştı. Senin gibi güçlü birine neden ihanet edeyim müdafi?"
languages.original_text: {n}He lets out a hoarse laugh.{/n} "Kunrad was weak, pathetic, and vain, and he was nothing compared to you. You spoke the name of the dawns, you spilt the blood of misbelievers, you released the master from his ancient prison. Kunrad could not accomplish even a shred of what you proved capable of. Why would I betray someone as strong as you, champion?"
